document_data.title: A Dish Best Served Cold

document_data.mainbody:
'''''A Dish Best Served Cold''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Storm King's Thunder|Storm King's Thunder]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Stagwick]], and is an adventure designed for three to seven 5{{th}}- to 10{{th}}-level characters.

{{Quote|''Stagwick’s long-standing peace with giant-kind is threatened as a patrol of Blood Riders spark a feud with a local tribe of giants. With word of strange activity coming from the Ice Spires, Good King Hartwick can’t be too careful. Can you quench the giants’ thirst for revenge?''|}}
